snippet.title: Mononeko: A Rhythm Adventure - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
In Mononeko, you weave attacks into the music, chain together movements and race against time to capture the kitten killers who are hiding a dark truth. It’s a quest for justice, set to the beat of your bravery.

Coming to PC, iOS and Android.

Ribeye Games is dedicated to developing fun and challenging rhythm games and create innovative new gameplay mechanics to keep the music game genre evolving and thriving. We are a game development studio based in Singapore, with a team spread across East Asia and Canada. We love cats and our team rescued many strays over the years. We might introduce you in a future Dev Diary when we have more to share about Mononeko as well! 

Early prototyping of Mononeko began in August 2022. The footage from back then can be found on our channel as the "Early Alpha Trailer". 

We love our dedicated fans who have supported us for the past 2 years!
